title: palukavEmi pathitha
sahitya:
palukavEmi patita pAvana karuNa jilkavEmi sujana jIvana

caraNam 1

 Orcina tapa mArcina angalArcina enta nErcina
   
caraNam 2

 dalacina ninnu golicina enta valacina bAga pilacina
   
caraNam 3

 delipina manasu nilipina pUja salipina matamu kalipina
   
caraNam 4

 gAncina ninu bhajincina madamu vancina uramuna nuncina
   
caraNam 5

 paTTina enta tiTTina ninnu juTTina padamu baTTina
   
caraNam 6

 Adina ninnu pADina enta vEDina koniyADina
   
caraNam 7

 kOrina maragu jErina ninnu dUrina enta pOrina
   
caraNam 8

 telisina buddhi galasina jUci solasina pEru delisna
   
caraNam 9

 mrokkina nIcE jikkina entO sokkina nIkE dikkina
 
caraNam 10

 nAgarAja shayana vEga rA shrI tyAgarAjanuta ghrNa sAgara
